Spring Vault Secrets Management and Encryption
Spring Vault Secrets Management and Encryption
relationships.tail: This tutorial demonstrates using Spring Vault to securely load and manage secrets from HashiCorp Vault. It covers Vault installation, CLI configuration with environment variables, storing key-value secrets, and integrating with Spring Boot via Spring Cloud Vault. The guide includes configuring `application.properties`, using `VaultOperations` for encrypted data handling, and mapping secrets to type-safe configuration classes. Demonstrates Vault's transit encryption backend for encrypting/decrypting data and executing commands via `CommandLineRunner`.
